name: sveltekit-electron
author: vishalbalaji
description: Test app with Sveltekit(node-adapter) and Electron.js.

scripts.dev: tsc -p electron && cross-env PORT=5173 concurrently --kill-others -n=svelte,electron -c='#ff3e00',blue 'nr dev:svelte' 'electron electron/dist/electron.cjs'
scripts.build:electron: ([ ! -d build/node ] && nr build:svelte || echo 'Using existing app build') && tsc -p electron && electron-builder --config electron/electron-builder.config.json
scripts.preview: tsc -p electron && cross-env PORT=4173 concurrently --kill-others -n=svelte,electron -c='#ff3e00',blue 'nr preview:svelte' 'electron electron/dist/electron.cjs'
